com.timerunner.entities

Class Entity

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.timerunner.entities.Entity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Entity>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Character, Player

    public abstract class Entity
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Entity>
    The Class Entity. The Entity is a super class for the characters and Player
